# Clustering methods

Kmeansclustering in R is done with the `kmeans()` function.  
Here we make up some data to test and learn with. 

```{r}
tmp <- c(rnorm(30, 3), rnorm(30, -3))
data <- cbind(tmp, rev(tmp))
plot(data)
```
